title: BRIEF-Cincinnati Financial Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $3.88
text:
55 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Cincinnati Financial Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $3.88 Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Cincinnati Financial Corp: 
* CINCINNATI FINANCIAL REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.88 
* ‍$542 MILLION INCREASE IN FOURTH-QUARTER 2017 NET INCOME, REFLECTING A $495 MILLION BENEFIT AFTER U.S. TAX REFORM​ 
* ‍$50.29 BOOK VALUE PER SHARE AT DECEMBER 31, 2017, UP $7.34 OR 17.1 PERCENT SINCE DECEMBER 31, 2016​ 
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.86 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
